original: Akusalo sārammaṇo dhammo akusalassa sārammaṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
analyzed: akusalaḥ sa ārammaṇaḥ dhammaḥ akusalassa sa ārammaṇassa dhammassa hetu paccayena paccayaḥ

original: Abyākato sārammaṇo dhammo abyākatassa sārammaṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.

original: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā satta, anantare satta …pe… sahajāte aññamaññe
analyzed: hetuyā tīṇi ārammaṇe nava adhipatiyā satta anantare satta pe sahajāte aññamaññe

original: nissaye tīṇi, upanissaye nava, āsevane tīṇi, kamme pañca, vipāke ekaṁ, āhāre …pe…
analyzed: nissaye tīṇi upanissaye nava āsevane tīṇi kamme pañca vipāke eka āhāre pe

original: sampayutte tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)

analyzed: hetu sahajāta ādi

original: 4.5.4. Kusalattika, Cittasampayuttadukādi
Kusalaṁ cittasampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… kusalaṁ cittasaṁsaṭṭhaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca
analyzed: kusalam citta sampayuttam dhammam paṭicca pe kusalam citta sasaṭṭham dhammam paṭicca

original: …pe… kusalaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… kusalaṁ cittasahabhuṁ dhammaṁ
analyzed: pe kusalam citta samuṭṭhānam dhammam paṭicca pe kusalam citta sahabhum dhamma

original: paṭicca …pe… kusalaṁ cittānuparivattiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… kusalaṁ cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṁ
analyzed: paṭicca pe kusalam citta anuparivattim dhammam paṭicca pe kusalam citta sasaṭṭha samuṭṭhāna

original: dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… kusalaṁ cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānasahabhuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe…
analyzed: dhammam paṭicca pe kusalam citta sasaṭṭha samuṭṭhāna sahabhum dhammam paṭicca pe

original: kusalaṁ cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānuparivattiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca kusalo cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānuparivatti
analyzed: kusalam citta sa saṭṭha samuṭṭhāna anuparivattim dhammam paṭicca kusalaḥ citta sa saṭṭha samuṭṭhāna anuparivatti

analyzed: hetuyā tīṇi ārammaṇe tīṇi pe vipāke ekam pe avigate tīṇi

original: (Sahajātavārampi …pe… sampayuttavārampi pañhāvārampi evaṁ vitthāretabbaṁ.)
analyzed: sahajāta vāram pi pe sampayutta vāram pi pañhā vāram pi evam

original: Ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā …pe… samanantare satta, sahajāte nissaye ekaṁ, upanissaye
analyzed: ārammaṇe nava adhipatiyā pe samanantare satta sahajāte nissaye eka upanissaye

original: Kusalaṁ noupādā ca abyākataṁ noupādā ca dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato noupādā dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: kusalam no upādā ca abyākatam no upādā ca dhammam paṭicca abyākataḥ no upādā dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Akusalaṁ noupādā ca abyākataṁ noupādā ca dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato noupādā dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: akusalam no upādā ca abyākatam no upādā ca dhammam paṭicca abyākataḥ no upādā dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate nava. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: hetuyā nava ārammaṇe tīṇi pe vipāke ekam pe avigate nava

original: Sahajātavārampi …pe… sampayuttavārampi paṭiccavārasadisaṁ.
analyzed: sahajāta vārampi pe sampayutta vārampi paṭicca vāra sadisa

original: Kusalo noupādā dhammo kusalassa noupādā dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
analyzed: kusalaḥ no upādā dhammaḥ kusalassa no upādā dhammassa hetu paccayena paccayaḥ tīṇi

original: Akusalo noupādā dhammo akusalassa noupādā dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
analyzed: akusalaḥ no upādā dhammaḥ akusalassa no upādā dhammassa hetu paccayena paccayaḥ tīṇi

original: Abyākato noupādā dhammo abyākatassa noupādā dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
analyzed: abyākataḥ no upādā dhammaḥ abyākatassa no upādā dhammassa hetu paccayena paccayaḥ

original: Kusalo noupādā dhammo kusalassa noupādā dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
analyzed: kusalaḥ no upādā dhammaḥ kusalassa no upādā dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena paccayaḥ tīṇi

original: Akusalo noupādā dhammo akusalassa noupādā dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
analyzed: akusalaḥ no upādā dhammaḥ akusalassa no upādā dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena paccayaḥ tīṇi

original: Abyākato noupādā dhammo abyākatassa noupādā dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: abyākataḥ no upādā dhammaḥ abyākatassa no upādā dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena paccayaḥ tīṇi saṅkhitta

original: Hetuyā satta, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā dasa, anantare …pe… sahajāte satta, aññamaññe tīṇi, nissaye upanissaye nava …pe… vippayutte tīṇi …pe… avigate ekādasa. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: hetuyā satta ārammaṇe nava adhipatiyā dasa anantare pe sahajāte satta aññamaññe tīṇi nissaye upanissaye nava pe vippayutte tīṇi pe avigate ekādasa saṅkhitta

original: (Yathā kusalattike pañhāvāraṁ, evaṁ vitthāretabbaṁ.)
analyzed: yathā kusala attike pañhāvāraḥ evam

original: 4.5.7. Kusalattika, Upādinnaduka
analyzed: kusalattika upādinna duka

original: Paccayacatukka
analyzed: paccaya catukka

original: Abyākataṁ upādinnaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato upādinno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: abyākatam upādinnam dhammam paṭicca abyākataḥ upādinnaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Hetuyā ekaṁ, ārammaṇe ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: hetuyā eka ārammaṇe ekaṃ pe avigate eka saṅkhitta

original: (Sahajātavārepi …pe… pañhāvārepi sabbattha ekaṁ.)
analyzed: sahajāta vāre pi pe pañhā vāre pi sabbattha eka

analyzed: kusalam anupādinnam dhammam paṭicca kusalaḥ anupādinnaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi

analyzed: akusalam anupādinnam dhammam paṭicca akusalaḥ anupādinnaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi

analyzed: abyākatam anupādinnam dhammam paṭicca abyākataḥ anupādinnaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Kusalaṁ anupādinnañca abyākataṁ anupādinnañca dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato anupādinno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: kusalam anupādinnam ca abyākatam anupādinnam ca dhammam paṭicca abyākataḥ anupādinnaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Akusalaṁ anupādinnañca abyākataṁ anupādinnañca dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato anupādinno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: akusalam anupādinnam ca abyākatam anupādinnam ca dhammam paṭicca abyākataḥ anupādinnaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate nava. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: hetuyā nava ārammaṇe tīṇi pe vipāke ekam pe avigate nava

original: (Sahajātavārampi …pe… sampayuttavārampi paṭiccavārasadisaṁ.)
analyzed: sahajāta vārampi pe sampayutta vārampi paṭicca vāra sadisa

original: Hetu-ārammaṇa
analyzed: hetu ārammaṇa

original: Kusalo anupādinno dhammo kusalassa anupādinnassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
analyzed: kusalaḥ anupādinnaḥ dhammaḥ kusalassa anupādinnassa dhammassa hetu paccayena paccayaḥ tīṇi

original: Akusalo anupādinno dhammo akusalassa anupādinnassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
analyzed: akusalaḥ anupādinnaḥ dhammaḥ akusalassa anupādinnassa dhammassa hetu paccayena paccayaḥ tīṇi

original: Abyākato anupādinno dhammo abyākatassa anupādinnassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
analyzed: abyākataḥ anupādinnaḥ dhammaḥ abyākatassa anupādinnassa dhammassa hetu paccayena paccayaḥ

original: Kusalo anupādinno dhammo kusalassa anupādinnassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
analyzed: kusalaḥ anupādinnaḥ dhammaḥ kusalassa anupādinnassa dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena paccayaḥ tīṇi

original: Akusalo anupādinno dhammo akusalassa anupādinnassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
analyzed: akusalaḥ anupādinnaḥ dhammaḥ akusalassa anupādinnassa dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena paccayaḥ tīṇi

original: Abyākato anupādinno dhammo abyākatassa anupādinnassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena
analyzed: abyākataḥ anupādinnaḥ dhammaḥ abyākatassa anupādinnassa dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena

original: paccayo. Abyākato anupādinno dhammo kusalassa anupādinnassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena
analyzed: paccayaḥ abyākataḥ anupādinnaḥ dhammaḥ kusalassa anupādinnassa dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena

original: paccayo. Abyākato anupādinno dhammo akusalassa anupādinnassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena
analyzed: paccayaḥ abyākataḥ anupādinnaḥ dhammaḥ akusalassa anupādinnassa dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena

original: paccayo … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: paccayaḥ tīṇi saṅkhitta

original: Hetuyā satta, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā dasa, anantare cha …pe… sahajāte nava, aññamaññe
analyzed: hetuyā satta ārammaṇe nava adhipatiyā dasa anantare cha pe sahajāte nava aññamaññe

original: tīṇi, nissaye nava, upanissaye nava, purejāte pacchājāte āsevane tīṇi …pe… vippayutte
analyzed: tīṇi nissaye nava upanissaye nava purejāte pacchājāte āsevane tīṇi pe vippayutte

original: tīṇi …pe… avigate ekādasa. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: tīṇi pe avigate ekādasa saṅkhitta

original: Kusalattikamahantaradukaṁ niṭṭhitaṁ.
analyzed: niṭṭhita

original: 4.5.8. Kusalattika, Upādānadukādi
Akusalaṁ upādānaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca akusalo upādāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: akusalam upādānam dhammam paṭicca akusalaḥ upādānaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta

original: Hetuyā ekaṁ, ārammaṇe ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ. (Upādānagocchakaṁ vitthāretabbaṁ.)
analyzed: hetuyā eka ārammaṇe ekam pe avigate eka upādāna gocchakam

original: Kusalattikaupādānagocchakaṁ niṭṭhitaṁ.
analyzed: kusalattika aupādāna gocchakam
